column1: 96471335$Ebon Illusion Magician$$DARK$[Spellcaster/xyz]$$$$$7$2500$2100$$2 Level 7 monsters$$You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 6 Spellcaster-Type Xyz Monster you control as the Xyz Material. (Xyz Materials attached to that monster also become Xyz Materials on this card.) Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card
column2: Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type Normal Monster from your hand or Deck. When a Spellcaster-Type Normal Monster declares an attack: You can target 1 card your opponent controls
column3: banish it. You can only use this effect of "Ebon Illusion Magician" once per turn.$$$$$

column1: 95486586$Elemental HERO Core$$EARTH$[Warrior/fusion]$$$$$9$2700$2200$$3 "Elemental HERO" monsters$$Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn, when this card is targeted for an attack: You can make this card's ATK become double its current ATK until the end of the Damage Step. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can target 1 monster on the field
column2: destroy it. When this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 Level 8 or lower "Elemental HERO" Fusion Monster in your Graveyard
column3: Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions.$$$$$

column1: 71696014$Magician's Robe$$DARK$[Spellcaster/effect]$$$$$2$700$2000$$$$During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Spell/Trap
column2: Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck. During your opponent's turn, if you activate a Spell/Trap Card or effect while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Magician's Robe" once per turn.$$$$$
